institution: Human Resources Development Service of Korea
category: Industry-led youth customized training business operating rules/Article 17 (Collaboration with industry-specific personnel committees)
contents: Article 17 (Collaboration with human resource committees for each industry) â‘  Cooperatives and organizations must share a business plan that includes training courses that reflect training demands with the human resources committees for each industry within one month of project implementation (referring to the date of conclusion of the contract between the Corporation and the business group). In this case, the Corporation must guide industry-specific human resources committees to share the business plan with cooperatives and organizations within two weeks after project implementation. Collaboration is required, including frequent sharing of related materials.
